DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine range single inhale dose new dry powder product , MDT-637 , safe well-tolerated . This include monitoring effect pulmonary function determination blood level MDT-637 follow inhalation .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Assess Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics MDT-637 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Males and/or surgically sterile postmenopausal female ( confirm FSH test ) ; male must agree practice barrier contraception discharge study Willing give write informed consent 18 50 year age BMI 1930 Kg/m2 Nonsmoker ( least 90 day prior screen ) willing abstain smoking course study Good general health determine medical history , physical examination , ECG clinical laboratory test Willing abstain alcohol , caffeine , xanthinecontaining beverage 24 hour prior 24 hour dose Uncontrolled , clinically significant disease opinion Principal Investigator MDT would place subject risk study participation would confound assessment safety MDT637 Evidence current history respiratory disease , include asthma , emphysema , chronic bronchitis , cystic fibrosis History significant nasal irritation nasal inhalation medication History malignancy History clinically significant alcohol drug abuse Positive drug screen drug abuse Positive test HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C Allergy lactose , lactose intolerance Use prescription medication within 14 day Visit 2 overthecounter preparation , include dietary herbal supplement , within 5 day Visit 2 Positive serum pregnancy test Visit 1 Inability perform reproducible spirometry Abnormal FEV1 , FVC , FEV1/FVC ( FEV1and FVC < 85 % predicted variability < 5 % FEV1/FVC ratio < 0.7 ) Abnormal QTc interval Visit 1 ( > 450 msec male > 470 msec female ) Significant blood donation ( test ) previous 8 week
